releaseNotes:
Release Notes - Hadoop Common - Version 0.17.0
A contrib package to update an index using Map/Reduce

issues.title: checkPath() throws IllegalArgumentException
du command throws an exception when the directory is not specified
infinite loop in dfs -cat command.
hadoop dfs -ls, -get, -mv command's source/destination URI are inconsistent
FileSystem should provide byte ranges for file locations
JobTracker becomes non-responsive if the task trackers finish task too fast
dfs ls and lsr commands differ from POSIX standards
dfs du and dus commands differ from POSIX standards
dfs mv command differs from POSIX standards
dfs rm and rmr commands differ from POSIX standards
dfs cat on a file that does not exist throws a java IOException
dfs mkdir command differs from POSIX standards
DataNode should have timeout on socket writes.
Name node silently changes state
Input key and value to combiner and reducer should be reused
Open and isDir should be removed from ClientProtocol
Namenode unstable when replicating 500k blocks at once
Copy on write for data and metadata files in the presence of snapshots
There is a small typeo in hdfs_test.c when testing the success of the local hadoop initialization
Web UI links to Hadoop homepage has to change to new hadoop homepage
Text is not subclassable because set(Text) and compareTo(Object) access the other instance's private members directly
org.apache.hadoop.net.NetworkTopology.InnerNode#getLeaf does not return the last node on a rack when used with an excluded node
build scripts broken by moving hbase to subproject
hod/hodlib/Common/xmlrpc.py uses HodInterruptException without importing it
TaskInProgress.hasSpeculativeTask is very inefficient
SetFile.Writer deprecated by mistake?
Streaming has no way to force entire record (or null) as key
Remove deprecated mapred.tasktracker.tasks.maximum and clusterStatus.getMaxTasks()
Remove deprecated Counters.getDisplayName(),  getCounterNames(),   getCounter(String counterName)
Remove deprecated methods in JobConf()
Remove deprecated classes in streaming
Remove deprecated classes in util
Remove deprecated classes in mapred
SimpleCharStream.getColumn(),  getLine() methods to be removed.
One of MiniMRCluster constructors needs tobe removed
MapOutputLocation.getFile() needs to be removed
FileSplit.getFile(), LineRecordReader. readLine() need to be removed
Remove deprecated methods in Configuration.java
bad code indentation in DFSClient
A SequenceFile.Reader object is not closed properly in CopyFiles
dfsadmin disk utilization report on Solaris is wrong
[HOD] If a cluster directory is deleted, hod -o list must show it, and deallocate should work.
[HOD] HOD fails to allocate a cluster if the tarball specified is a relative path
FSDataOutputStream should not flush() inside close().
Datanode.shutdown() and Namenode.stop() should close all rpc connections
Unit tests (16) fail on Windows due to java.lang.IllegalArgumentException causing MiniMRCluster to not start up
Namenode fails to re-start after cluster shutdown - DFSClient: Could not obtain blocks even all datanodes were up & live
HDFS should recover when  replicas of block have different sizes (due to corrupted block)
The dfsclient on exit deletes files that are open and not closed.
[HOD] hdfs:///mapredsystem directory not cleaned up after deallocation
the job tracker should not start 2 info servers
forrest docs for dfs shell commands and semantics.
Unit test fails: org.apache.hadoop.dfs.TestFsck.testFsck. This is a regression
HOD is trying to bring up task tracker on  port which is already in close_wait state
Unit test fails on Windows: org.apache.hadoop.fs.TestDU.testDU
Trash initialization generates "deprecated filesystem name" warning even if the name is correct.
NPE while loading  FSImage
HOD should generate hdfs://host:port on the client side configs.
some of the fs commands don't globPaths.
Compression for intermediate map output is broken
ant test fail for TestCrcCorruption with OutofMemory.
Wrong class definition for hodlib/Hod/hod.py for Python < 2.5.1
SocketTimeoutException in unit tests
org.apache.hadoop.dfs.TestDFSShell.testErrOutPut fails on Windows with NullPointerException
Unit test fails on Windows: org.apache.hadoop.dfs.TestLocalDFS.testWorkingDirectory
ipc unit tests fail due to connection errors
Blocks staying underreplicated (for unclosed file)
[HOD] checknodes should look for free nodes without the jobs attribute
[HOD] local_fqdn() returns None when gethostbyname_ex doesnt return any FQDNs.
Sequential distributed upgrades.
StreamBaseRecordReader's getProgress returns just 0 or 1
DataNode sends wrong length in header while pipelining.
SocketIOWithTimeout does not handle thread interruption
TestFileCreation fails while restarting cluster
dfs -mv file to user home directory fails silently if the user home directory does not exist
Eclipse plugin fails to compile due to missing RPC.stopClient() method
ChecksumFileSystem needs to support the new delete method
Misleading log message "firstbadlink" printed by datanodes
InMemoryFileSystem.reserveSpaceWithChecksum does not look at failures while reserving space for the file in question
Remove compiler warnings for ant test
Fix findBugs warnings in UpgradeUtilities.
Streaming should assume an empty key if the first character on a line is the seperator (stream.map.output.field.separator, by default, tab)
Within a task, the value ofJobConf.getOutputPath() method is modified
NNBench does not use the right configuration for the mapper
Cluster fall into infinite loop trying to replicate a block to a target that aready has this replica.
MiniMRCluster is ignoring parameter taskTrackerFirst
Exception with file globbing closures
Namenode does not process block report if the rack-location script is not provided on namenode
Should not require superuser privilege to query if hdfs is in safe mode
DFSInputStream 'pread' does not close its sockets
SocketOutputStream.close() should close the channel.
Remove flush calls from JobHistory
Remove lease when file is renamed
Test case was missed in commit of HADOOP-3040
JobInfo session object is not refreshed in loadHistory.jsp  if same job is accessed again.
streaming should accept stderr from task before first key arrives
ma/reduce throws the following exception if "io.serializations" is not set:
BytesWritable.toString prints bytes above 0x80 as FFFFFF80
Update documentation in mapred_tutorial to add Debugging
TestDFSShell fails on Windows.
Namenode NPE while loading fsimage after a cluster upgrade from older disk format
DFS data node should not use hard coded 10 minutes as write timeout.
[HOD] Update hod version number
JobTracker should not try to promote a (map) task if it does not write to DFS at all
DFSOutputStream.flush should be renamed as DFSOutputStream.fsync
[HOD] Hod should deallocate cluster if there's a problem in writing information to the state file
TestMiniMRLocalFS fails in trunk on Windows
TestFileAppend fails on Mac since HADOOP-2655 was committed
Map/reduce stops working with comma separated input paths
FsShell no longer accepts stdin as a source for -put/-copyFromLocal
SpillThread throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, which is ignored by MapTask
reduce amount of logging in hadoop streaming
"-get file -" does not work
gridmix scripts for small and medium jobs need to be changed to handle input paths differently
Unit test fails on Windows: TestJobShell.testJobShell
LocalFSMerger needs to catch throwable
WritableDeserializer does not pass the Configuration to deserialized Writables
Safemode log message need to be corrected.
Hadoop dfs -help for permissions contains a typo
hadoop dfs -du /dirPath does not work with hadoop-0.17 branch
FsShell showing null instead of a error message
Map OutputCollector does not report progress on writes
Unit test failed on windows: TestDFSShell.testErrOutPut
exists() calls logs FileNotFoundException in namenode log
SequenceFileAsBinaryRecordReader seems always to read from the start of a file, not the start of the split.
gridmix scripts have a few bugs
WARN message on command line when a hadoop jar command is executed
JobHistory file on HDFS should not use the 'job name'
job history browser throws exception if job name or user name is null.
Remove HOD changes from CHANGES.txt, as they are now inside src/contrib/hod
TaskTracker should check for SUCCEEDED task status in addition to COMMIT_PENDING status when it fails maps due to lost map outputs
virtual address space limits break streaming apps
map tasks with node local splits do not always read from local nodes
Gridmix jobs'  output dir names may collide
Hadoop rpc metrics do not get pushed to the MetricsRecord
TestUlimit fails on LINUX
Memory leak when files are not cleanly closed
Too many trash sockets and trash pipes opened
FsShell should work with paths in non-default FileSystem
Abstract node to switch mapping into a topology service class used by namenode and jobtracker
Add support for a general serialization mechanism for Map Reduce
JobConf should have a setInputPathFilter method
Command to pull corrupted files
du like command to count number of files under a given directory
Enhancements to DFSClient to support flushing data at any point in time
setting memory limits for tasks
output format classes that can write to different files depending on  keys and/or config variable
contrib package provides a utility to build or update an index
FileSystems should track how many bytes are read and written
Stringifier
Make index interval configuable when using MapFileOutputFormat for map-reduce job
Local file system uses copy to implement rename
Namenode should return error when trying to delete non-empty directory
Reduces can do merges for the on-disk map output files in parallel with their copying
Eclipse project files
Hadoop should provide a way to allow the user to specify jar file(s) the user job depends on
improve semantics of the hadoop dfs command
streaming should optionally treat a non-zero exit status of a child process as a failed task
Job.local.dir to be exposed to tasks
Inefficient FSDataset.getBlockFile()
Job history on HDFS
Security:  Need to be able to encrypt Hadoop socket connections
new transactions to support HDFS Appends
Make EC2 cluster nodes more independent of each other
The codes in FSDirectory.mkdirs(...) is inefficient.
EC2 termination script should support termination by group
hadoop-env.sh needs finer granularity
Refactor the HTable#get and HTable#getRow methods to avoid repetition of retry-on-failure logic
DFS should place one replica per rack
Remove deprecated FileSystem#listPaths()
Deprecate exists() and isDir() to simplify ClientProtocol.

Adding support into build.xml to build a special hadoop jar file that has the MiniDFSCluster and MiniMRCluster classes among others necessary for building and running the unit tests of Pig on the local mini cluster
Reduce memory copies when data is read from DFS
For script option hod should exit with distinguishable exit codes for script code and hod exit code.
Formatable changes log as html
Need new Hadoop Core logo
Remove the deprecated INode.getAbsoluteName()
Remove deprecated methods in FileSystem
Dfs methods should not throw RemoteException
Remove the deprecated ipc.Server.getUserInfo()
Track individual RPC metrics.
Enhancements to gridmix scripts
String for configuring profiling should be customizable
replace accesss of "fs.default.name" with FileSystem accessor methods
Create fewer copies of buffer data during sort/spill
Make the Hudson patch process an executable ant target
[HOD] Hod should redirect stderr and stdout of Hadoop daemons to assist debugging
Specify which JAVA_HOME should be set
DFSClient calls toString on strings.
StreamUtils abuses StringBuffers
Text and BytesWritable's raw comparators should use the lengths provided instead of rebuilding them from scratch using readInt
hadoop dfs -put should support multiple src
Show counter values from "job -status" command
Need new options in distcp for preserving ower, group and permission
Build native libraries on Solaris
Decrease the number of slaves in TestMiniMRDFSSort to 3.
Improve documentation and supply an example for MultiFileInputFormat
[HOD] Put in place unit test framework for HOD
Add test for non-writable serializer
Follow Apache process for getting ready to put crypto code in to project
